evidence.text: COMPLAINT AND EX PARTE APPLICATION FOR A TRO AND PI, against All Defendants. Filed by Camp Integrity, Courtney Huff, Amalia Mendoza, Shaleeta Boyd, Anker Aardalen, Floyd Barrow, Donald Hensley, Jeff Grove, Eddy Metz, Brian Nelson, Christie Marie Cook. (Attachments: # 1 Complaint Continued, # 2 Complaint Continued, # 3 Complaint Continued, # 4 Complaint Continued, # 5 Civil Cover Sheet)(wsn, COURT STAFF) (Filed on 8/11/2023) (Entered: 08/14/2023)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Complaint with Ex Parte Application for Temporary Restraining Order (TRO) and Preliminary Injunction (PI) on August 11, 2023, seeking to halt implementation of San Rafael Code 19.50 and SMC 19.20.080(c) to prevent enforcement of ordinances regulating camping on public property.

evidence.text: Reply to Defendants Opposition to Plaintiff's Preliminary Injunction ) filed by Brian Nelson. (Attachments: # 1 Affidavit Declaration of Jeff Grove, # 2 Affidavit Declaration of Brian Nelson, # 3 Affidavit Declaration of Ankor Aardalen, # 4 Affidavit Declaration of Shaleeta Boyd, # 5 Affidavit Declaration Amalia Mendoz, # 6 Affidavit Supplemental Declaration Dr. Schonberg, # 7 Exhibit A: Barocas JA, Nall SK, Axelrath S, et al. Population-Level Health Effects of Involuntary Displacement of People Experiencing Unsheltered Homelessness Who Inject Drugs in US Cities. Journal of the American Medical Association. 2023;329(17):14781486., # 8 Exhibit B: Kushel, M., Moore, T., et al. (2023). Toward a New Understanding- The California Statewide Study of People Experiencing Homelessness. UCSF Benioff Homelessness and Housing Initiative..pdf, ... (Nelson, Brian) (Filed on 8/25/2023) (Entered: 08/25/2023)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed a Reply to Defendants' Opposition to their Motion for Preliminary Injunction on August 25, 2023, supporting their request for PI with declarations and exhibits detailing health impacts of displacement on unhoused individuals.

evidence.text: OPPOSITION/RESPONSE (re 1 PETITION: Defendants' further briefing re preliminary injunction< filed byChristine Alilovich, Maribeth Bushey, City of San Rafael, Kate Colin, Chris Hess, Elie Hill, Rachel Kertz, Amy Miller, David Spiller. (Attachments: # 1 Declaration Catherine Quffa, # 2 Declaration Don C. Jeppson, # 3 Declaration (Supplemental) Carl Huber, # 4 Declaration (Supplemental) Chris Hess, # 5 Declaration (Supplemental) Lynn Murphy, # 6 Declaration (Supplemental) Ryan Montes, # 7 Notice of Manual Filing, # 8 Certificate/Proof of Service)(von Loewenfeldt, Michael) (Filed on 9/15/2023) Modified on 9/18/2023 (msr, COURT STAFF). (Entered: 09/15/2023)

extracted.value: Defendants filed an Opposition/Response to Plaintiffs' Motion for Preliminary Injunction on September 15, 2023, including declarations from various individuals and a Notice of Manual Filing.

evidence.text: AMENDED COMPLAINT Adding New Plaintiffs against All Defendants. Filed byBrian Nelson. (Nelson, Brian) (Filed on 9/26/2023) (Entered: 09/26/2023)

extracted.value: Plaintiffs filed an Amended Complaint adding new plaintiffs on September 26, 2023, to include additional individuals in the case.
